sqlMap.select: select idExpensesShipper, idJobSheet, idShipperFee, charge, kurs, description, kursValue, descriptionInvoice, oriKurs, oriWeight, isTax, isVat, totalTax, totalVat from expensesshipper where idExpensesShipper = #idExpensesShipper#
select idExpensesShipper, idJobSheet, idShipperFee, charge, kurs, description, kursValue, descriptionInvoice, oriKurs, oriWeight, isTax, isVat, totalTax, totalVat from expensesshipper

select es.idExpensesShipper, es.idJobSheet, es.idShipperFee, es.charge, es.kurs, sf.aliasName, sf.description as descriptionFee, es.description, es.kursValue, es.descriptionInvoice, es.oriKurs, es.oriWeight, es.isTax, es.isVat, es.totalTax, es.totalVat, sf.category from expensesshipper es left join shipperfee sf on es.idShipperFee = sf.idShipperFee where es.idJobSheet = #idJobSheet# order by es.idExpensesShipper
select ifnull(sum(charge),0) as totalCharge from expensesshipper where idJobSheet = #idJobSheet# and kurs = 'IDR'
select ifnull(sum(charge),0) as totalCharge from expensesshipper where idJobSheet = #idJobSheet# and kurs = 'USD'

select es.idExpensesShipper, es.idJobSheet, es.idShipperFee, es.charge, es.kurs, sf.aliasName, sf.description as descriptionFee, es.description, es.kursValue, es.descriptionInvoice, es.oriKurs, es.oriWeight, es.isTax, es.isVat, es.totalTax, es.totalVat, sf.category from expensesshipper es left join shipperfee sf on es.idShipperFee = sf.idShipperFee where es.idJobSheet in ( select j.idJobSheet from jobsheet j where j.jobNo = #jobNo# ) order by es.idExpensesShipper

sqlMap.update: update expensesshipper set idJobSheet = #idJobSheet:INTEGER#, idShipperFee = #idShipperFee:INTEGER#, charge = #charge:DOUBLE#, kurs = #kurs:VARCHAR#, description = #description:VARCHAR#, kursValue = #kursValue:DOUBLE#, descriptionInvoice = #descriptionInvoice:VARCHAR#, oriKurs = #oriKurs:DOUBLE#, oriWeight = #oriWeight:DOUBLE#, isTax = #isTax:INTEGER#, isVat = #isVat:INTEGER#, totalTax = #totalTax:DOUBLE#, totalVat = #totalVat:DOUBLE# where idExpensesShipper = #idExpensesShipper#
